title: ReKittyPaw
description: Highly configurable anarchy minecraft item delivery bot with a complete discord integration.

title: ASW Lynx
description: My first attempt to build a public website, made when I was 15 years old, meant to be secure, using a FastAPI backend.

title: Youtube Patcher
description: Data patcher for Youtube Playables made in React JS and Python. (CURL parser)

title: EyeSystem-Core
description: Rewrite of EyeSystem by Animador-BJ, with an updated NiceGUI look and a public Web Interface, made to demonstrate to a friend that he could probably win a coding contest.

title: BeatSaber-RegionalBot
description: Regional discord bot for tracking Beat Saber player's scores, with additional competitivity functions and multisocket compatibility and synchronization.

title: Quest Alert Disabler
description: Electron app to disable Meta Quest's system alerts (may damage your device in case of real hardware damage).

title: data_to_avi
description: Rust CLI tool to convert any kind of file into a dot AVI file for online storage.
